title: 57. The 2nd American Revolution? - Part 2
itunes:title: 57. The 2nd American Revolution? - Part 2
description: Americans will be free when Americans decide to be free. If you have been silent about the things going on, the time to speak up is now. Following up on the last episode, Andy and the guys discuss the statistics behind the Coronavirus, why more people need to be vocal about the shutdown, and the revolution our country is going through.
